amendments.title: Draft Food Safety and Standards (Food Products Standards and Food Additives) Amendment Regulations, 2025
amendments.description: Amendments to food products standards and food additives regulations
amendments.relevance_reason: RoastCoffee is a food manufacturer and any changes to product standards or permissible additives could directly affect its coffee formulations.
amendments.potential_impact: May require reformulation of coffee blends or adjustment of ingredient listings to comply with updated standards.

amendments.title: Draft Food Safety and Standards (Vegan Foods) Amendment Regulations, 2025
amendments.affects: Vegan food manufacturers, Vegan food distributors
amendments.relevance_reason: Coffee is inherently vegan, so if RoastCoffee markets its products as vegan, the vegan‑food regulations could apply.
amendments.potential_impact: May necessitate verification of vegan claims, ingredient sourcing documentation, and possible label updates.

amendments.title: Draft Notification of Food Safety and Standards
amendments.description: The Food Safety and Standards Authority of India proposes to amend the Food Safety and Standards (Labelling and Display) Regulations, 2020.
amendments.affects: food manufacturers, food distributors, food retailers
amendments.relevance_reason: As a food manufacturer, RoastCoffee must comply with any new labelling and display requirements.
amendments.potential_impact: Changes to mandatory label information (e.g., ingredient list, nutritional information, allergen declarations) for coffee packaging.

amendments.title: Food Safety and Standards (Labelling and Display) Amendment Regulations, 2025
amendments.description: The Food Safety and Standards Authority of India amends the Food Safety and Standards (Labelling and Display) Regulations, 2020, to include changes to the labelling requirements for food products.
amendments.affects: food manufacturers, food distributors, food retailers
amendments.relevance_reason: RoastCoffee, as a manufacturer, must update its product labels to meet the revised labelling standards.
amendments.potential_impact: Potential redesign of packaging labels to incorporate new mandatory statements, font sizes, or format specifications.

amendments.title: Food Safety and Standards (Packaging) First Amendment Regulations, 2025
amendments.description: The Food Safety and Standards Authority of India amends the Food Safety and Standards (Packaging) Regulations, 2018, to include changes to the packaging requirements for food products.
amendments.affects: food manufacturers, food distributors, food retailers
amendments.relevance_reason: Packaging requirements apply to RoastCoffee’s product containers and materials.
amendments.potential_impact: May require adoption of new packaging materials, labeling placement, or compliance with updated safety and environmental standards.
